unnormalised: Folks, looks like cooking up a storm this Diwali might cost you a bit more! The price of domestic LPG cylinders has seen another minor nudge upwards, leaving many housewives and small restaurant owners in Delhi feeling the pinch.
normalised: Folks, looks like cooking up a storm this Diwali might cost you a bit more! The price of domestic L P G cylinders has seen another minor nudge upwards, leaving many housewives and small restaurant owners in Delhi feeling the pinch.

unnormalised: Sources at Indian Oil indicate that the increase, about Rs. 50 per cylinder, is due to rising global crude prices and fluctuating exchange rates. While not a massive hike, it definitely adds to the existing burden. Imagine the cost of prepping all those festive sweets and savory snacks!
normalised: Sources at Indian Oil indicate that the increase, about rupees fifty per cylinder, is due to rising global crude prices and fluctuating exchange rates. While not a massive hike, it definitely adds to the existing burden. Imagine the cost of prepping all those festive sweets and savory snacks!

unnormalised: "It's like they're trying to spoil our biryani party!" exclaimed a local restaurant owner in Hyderabad, known for his Hyderabadi Dum Biryani.
normalised: "It's like they're trying to spoil our biryani party!" exclaimed a local restaurant owner in Hyderabad, known for his Hyderabadi Dum Biryani.

unnormalised: This comes just as families are gearing up for Diwali celebrations, with increased cooking and gatherings. Experts suggest consumers explore options like bulk booking or using efficient cooking methods to save on gas.
normalised: This comes just as families are gearing up for Diwali celebrations, with increased cooking and gatherings. Experts suggest consumers explore options like bulk booking or using efficient cooking methods to save on gas.

unnormalised: Will the government offer any Diwali bonanza to ease the burden? Let's wait and watch. Maybe Santa (or should we say, Lakshmi) will deliver some good news! Keep an eye on the cooking gas prices, folks! Every Rupee counts.
normalised: Will the government offer any Diwali bonanza to ease the burden? Let's wait and watch. Maybe Santa (or should we say, Lakshmi) will deliver some good news! Keep an eye on the cooking gas prices, folks! Every Rupee counts.
